title: Coleen Rooney grabs a coffee after spilling the tea amid Rebekah Vardy drama
text:
Coleen was pictured in her gym clothes (Picture: Splash!)

Coleen Rooney has had an eventful week, what with accusing fellow WAG Rebekah Vardy of selling fake stories of her.

But she seems to be taking the whole thing in her stride as she was spotted grabbing a Costa coffee and a bite to eat in Alderley Edge, Cheshire on Monday morning.

Coleen wore a bright pink hoodie and black leggings and looked like she didn’t have a care in the world as Rebekah arrived home to the UK from Dubai crying after she denied selling stories to tabloids.

In one of the most riveting stories in the WAG universe, Coleen made bombshell accusations last week, writing on Instagram that she had suspected Vardy of selling stories and set up an elaborate sting operation to expose Rebekah.

All of which, Rebekah denies strenuously.

Coleen recently dropped the bombshell claims about Rebekah on Instagram (Picture: Splash)

The former I’m A Celebrity star was pictured arriving at Heathrow Airport clearly overcome with emotion and in pictures obtained by The Sun could be seen holding her hands over her face as she cried, with her husband Jamie Vardy beside her, holding her hands.

Coleen and Rebekah became friends as their husbands played alongside each other for England, but the friendship appears to be no more as Jamie unfollowed Wayne Rooney on Instagram.

It is thought that the two women are speaking through lawyers following the allegations.

She accused Rebekah of selling stories to tabloids (Picture: Splash)

Coleen wrote that she had set up a sting in order to discover who was selling the stories about her and the Rooney family by setting up fake stories and only giving access to her stories to Rebekah.

‘It’s been tough keeping it to myself and not making any comment at all, especially when the stories have been leaked, however, I had to,’ she wrote.

‘Now I know for certain which account/individual it’s come from.

‘I have saved and screenshotted all the original stories which clearly show just one person has viewed them. It’s…… Rebekah Vardy’s account.’

The 38-year-old has denied all the allegations and has since called on lawyers to find out who had access to her Instagram and when.
